title: Introduction to Social Policy
description:
This module introduces the various policies social workers should be familiar with in order to work with different population groups, particularly those who are vulnerable. By understanding how and why particular policies develop, students learn to analyze policy and think critically about the use of policy for intervention in the social work profession.

Students intending to move on to the Honours year are strongly encouraged to take this module, as it will be helpful for SW4102 Advanced Social Policy and Planning.
